references.paper_title: Beyond a gaussian denoiser: Residual learning of deep cnn for image denoising
references.reason: This paper is foundational in the field of deep learning-based image denoising, introducing residual learning for CNNs and significantly improving performance.
This paper introduces the non-local neural network, a crucial architecture for capturing long-range dependencies in images, which is highly relevant to the proposed SelfFormer model.

references.paper_title: Real image denoising with feature attention
references.reason: This paper addresses the challenge of real-world image denoising by incorporating feature attention, which is directly relevant to the proposed approach in focusing on handling real-world noise.

references.paper_title: Variational denoising network: Toward blind noise modeling and removal
references.reason: This paper proposes a variational denoising network that tackles blind noise modeling, directly addressing the limitations of methods trained on synthetic noise.

references.paper_title: A high-quality denoising dataset for smartphone cameras
references.reason: This paper introduces a high-quality real-world dataset (SIDD) that is widely used for benchmarking real-world image denoising algorithms, and the results of the proposed method are compared against results on this dataset.
